original_text: And Onan knew that the seed should not be his; and it came to pass, when he went in unto his brother's wife, that he spilled it on the ground, lest that he should give seed to his brother.
korean_text: 오난이 그 씨가 자기 것이 되지 않을 줄 알므로 형수에게 들어갔을 때에 그의 형에게 씨를 주지 아니하려고 땅에 설정하매

sentences.original_text: that the seed should not be his
sentences.korean_translation: 그 씨가 자기 것이 될 수 없다는 것을

sentences.original_text: when he went in unto his brother's wife
that he spilled it on the ground
lest that he should give seed to his brother
